findings.title: blockIfChangingAddress
findings.description: This finding indicates a potential security vulnerability where the contract does not properly handle changes to its address.

findings.title: blockIfChangingToken
findings.description: The 'blockIfChangingToken' function does not properly handle token changes, potentially leading to unintended behavior.

findings.title: ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable
findings.description: The contract implements ReentrancyGuardUpgradeable which can prevent reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: onlyOwner
findings.description: The onlyOwner modifier is used to restrict access to certain functions, but it may not be properly implemented or validated.

findings.title: Disallow if State is Changing
findings.description: The function does not check if the state is changing before performing certain operations.

findings.title: NO ERC20
findings.description: The smart contract does not implement the ERC20 standard.
findings.function: mint, burn, allowance, approve, increaseAllowance, decreaseAllowance
